event.description: Jose Reyes flies out to center fielder Jordan Schafer.
Daniel Murphy singles on a line drive to left fielder Garret Anderson.
Carlos Beltran strikes out on a foul tip.
Carlos Delgado singles on a line drive to center fielder Jordan Schafer. Daniel Murphy to 3rd.
David Wright strikes out swinging.
Ryan Church strikes out swinging, catcher David Ross to first baseman Casey Kotchman.
Ramon Castro singles on a ground ball to right fielder Jeff Francoeur.
Luis Castillo reaches on a force attempt, fielding error by second baseman Omar Infante. Ramon Castro to 2nd.
Livan Hernandez out on a sacrifice bunt, pitcher Kenshin Kawakami to second baseman Omar Infante. Ramon Castro to 3rd. Luis Castillo to 2nd.
Jose Reyes walks.
Daniel Murphy flies out to center fielder Jordan Schafer.
Carlos Beltran singles on a soft fly ball to center fielder Jordan Schafer.
Carlos Delgado strikes out swinging.

David Wright doubles (7) on a fly ball to left fielder Garret Anderson. Carlos Beltran scores.

With Ramon Castro batting, passed ball by David Ross, David Wright to 3rd.
Ramon Castro doubles (1) on a ground ball to right fielder Jeff Francoeur. David Wright scores.
